00021 namespace xint {
00022 
00035 int compare(const integer &b1, const integer &b2, bool ignoresign) {
00036     b1._throw_if_nan();
00037     b2._throw_if_nan();
00038 
00039     if (!ignoresign) {
00040         int sign1=b1.sign(), sign2=b2.sign();
00041         if (sign1==0 && sign2==0) return 0;
00042         if (sign1==0) return -sign2;
00043         if (sign2==0) return sign1;
00044 
00045         if (sign1 != sign2) return sign1;
00046         if (sign1 < 0) return compare(-b2, -b1, ignoresign);
00047     }
00048 
00049     const detail::data_t *b1data=b1._get_data();
00050     const detail::data_t *b2data=b2._get_data();
00051 
00052     int answer=0;
00053     if (b1data->mLength != b2data->mLength) {
00054         answer=((b1data->mLength < b2data->mLength) ? -1 : 1);
00055     } else {
00056         for (int x = int(b1data->mLength) - 1; x >= 0; --x) {
00057             if (b1data->digits[x] != b2data->digits[x]) {
00058                 answer=((b1data->digits[x] < b2data->digits[x]) ? -1 : 1);
00059                 break;
00060             }
00061         }
00062     }
00063 
00064     return answer;
00065 }
00066 
00067 bool operator!(const xint::integer &num1) { return num1.sign()==0; }
00068 bool operator==(const xint::integer &num1, const xint::integer &num2) { return xint::compare(num1, num2)==0; }
00069 bool operator!=(const xint::integer& num1, const xint::integer& num2) { return xint::compare(num1, num2)!=0; }
00070 bool operator<(const xint::integer& num1, const xint::integer& num2) { return xint::compare(num1, num2)<0; }
00071 bool operator>(const xint::integer& num1, const xint::integer& num2) { return xint::compare(num1, num2)>0; }
00072 bool operator<=(const xint::integer& num1, const xint::integer& num2) { return xint::compare(num1, num2)<=0; }
00073 bool operator>=(const xint::integer& num1, const xint::integer& num2) { return xint::compare(num1, num2)>=0; }
00074
